name: Silver Salmon Bay
description:
Navigate your Boat with A,D or Arrow Keys

Throw out  and Pull in your fishing rod with Left Mouse Button.
Throw fish to the merchant with Right Mouse Button.

Collect 2000$ to retire (if you wish to :)

Thank you for playing!

Graphics and Code: Dalton5000

Music: audionautix.com

Soundeffects: freesound.org

Created in Godot Engine 3.1
